content.html: Sufficiently annoyed with Pop OS, especially that I don't know whether to blame it or my own puttering. Trying EndeavorOS with Qtile. By installing an Arch-based distro, I know who to blame if something goes wrong: me, for installing an Arch.
content.value:
Sufficiently annoyed with Pop OS, especially that I don't know whether to blame it or my own puttering.

Trying EndeavorOS with Qtile. By installing an Arch-based distro, I know who to blame if something goes wrong: me, for installing an Arch.
